lead_paragraph: The Swiss government failed to act swiftly to prevent a credit and tax crisis that had endangered banking giant UBS in 2008-9 and could have sunk the Swiss economy, a parliamentary report charged on Monday, Reuters said.
snippet: The Swiss government failed to act swiftly to prevent a credit and tax crisis that had endangered banking giant UBS AG in 2008-2009 and could have sunk the Swiss economy, a parliamentary report said on Monday.

headline.main: Swiss Report Slams Government on UBS Crisis

abstract: The Swiss government failed to act swiftly to prevent a credit and tax crisis that had endangered banking giant UBS AG in 2008-2009 and could have sunk the Swiss economy, a parliamentary report said on Monday.
